response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing our clients' resources wisely, and we are confident that this product will significantly contribute to your success. Considering its exceptional quality and potential benefits, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction. We look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 1200000}
